alert.note: Alert for Bladen; Columbus; Inland Brunswick; Inland Pender (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 25 at 3:30PM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...Strong showers will impact portions of western Pender, southeastern Bladen, central Brunswick and eastern Columbus Counties through 400 PM EST... At 329 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong showers along a line extending from near Wallace to near Longwood. Movement was northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Leland, Burgaw, Shallotte, Rowan, Northwest, Sandyfield, Bishop, Penderlea, Makatoka, Point Caswell, Freeland, Long Creek, Supply, Exum, Longwood, Brunswick County Community College Main Campus, Currie, Wards Corner, Ash and The Borough. This includes the following highways... Interstate 40 between mile markers 389 and 403. US Route 17 in Brunswick County between mile markers 13 and 31, and between mile markers 37 and 40. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Bladen; Columbus; Inland Brunswick; Inland Pender
